dublinCore.dc:title: 113 HR 3285 IH: To make technical corrections to the Pay Our Military Act to include midshipmen at the United States Merchant Marine Academy, who are appointed as midshipmen in the Navy Reserve.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Grimm (for himself, Mr. King of New York, Mr. Nunnelee, Mr. Hunter, Mr. Forbes, Mr. Kelly of Pennsylvania, and Mr. Thompson of Pennsylvania) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Appropriations

form.official-title: To make technical corrections to the Pay Our Military Act to include midshipmen at the United States Merchant Marine Academy, who are appointed as midshipmen in the Navy Reserve.

section.header: Continuing appropriations for midshipmen at the United States Merchant Marine Academy

subsection.text: Section 2 of the Pay Our Military Act (Public Law 113–39) is amended—

subparagraph.text: in paragraph (1), by inserting (including those specified in section 51311(b) of title 46, United States Code) after reserve components thereof; and

clause.text: by striking (and the Department and inserting (the Department;
by inserting and the Department of Transportation in the case of the United States Merchant Marine Academy after Coast Guard; and
by inserting or those in training for such service before the semicolon; and

subparagraph.text: in paragraph (1), by striking and at the end;
in paragraph (2), by striking the period at the end and inserting ; and; and
by adding at the end the following:

paragraph.text: the Secretary of Transportation with respect to matters concerning the United States Merchant Marine Academy.

subsection.text: The amendments made by subsection (a) shall take effect as if enacted as part of the Pay Our Military Act (Public Law 113–39).
